articles.content: You don't have to wonder what Xbox cloud gaming looks like on the web. The Verge has learned that Microsoft has started testing xCloud game streaming in browsers, and the experience will seem familia… [+1052 chars]

articles.author: Jody Serrano
articles.title: It Looks Like Google’s Starting to Update Its Major iOS Apps - Gizmodo
articles.description: There are signs the waiting could be over. It seems like Google has finally decided to start updating its major iOS apps. The company released an update for YouTube this weekend, more than two months after its last update.
articles.content: There are signs the waiting could be over. It seems like Google has finally decided to start updating its major iOS apps.The company released an update for YouTube this weekend, more than two months … [+2203 chars]
